titleStmt.title: A character of an antimalignant, or right Parliamentier; expressing plainly his opinion concerning King and Parliament. Published by authoritie.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F.N. for Robert Bostock dwelling in Pauls Churchyard, at the sign of the Kings Head.,
